arts.ttl: Paul Warne comes out fighting after Derby County defeat leaves Rams in relegation zone
arts.sum: Paul Warne says he is still the man to rescue Derby County after defeat to Cardiff City left them two points adrift of safety in the Championship relegation zone. Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone.

arts.ttl: Cardiff City set to sign Ajax midfielder Sivert Mannsverk on loan
arts.sum: Championship side Cardiff City are on the verge of signing Ajax’s Sivert Mannsverk. According to De Telegraaf, the 22-year-old has agreed to join the Welsh side on loan for the…

arts.ttl: Derby County player ratings v Cardiff City as one man stands out but horrific run continues - Leigh Curtis
arts.sum: Derby got off to an encouraging start as Jerry Yates latched onto a header from Callum Elder, drew aim and forced a smart save from Jak Alnwick. At the other end, Zetterstrom bailed Craig Forsyth out of trouble when his mistake handed El Ghazi a chance but the goalkeeper made an outstanding save and he was at it again when he dived to keep out Yousef Salech.

Minutes later City doubled their lead, goal scorer Robinson played it through to El Ghazi who fired home from inside the box to claim his third goal of the season. It was City who had the first clear cut chance of the match, as Ralls' curling effort from outside the box looked to be going in, but Jacob Widell Zetterström did just enough to tip it over the bar.

arts.ttl: Callum Robinson scores again as Cardiff beat Derby
Second-half double inspires Cardiff City to victory over fellow strugglers Derby County
arts.sum: Cardiff eased their relegation worries with a hard-fought 2-1 win over Derby County

arts.ttl: Paul Warne handed boost as he rings changes in Derby County team to face Cardiff
arts.sum: Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone. Derby: Zetterstrom, Nyambe, Cashin, Forsyth, Elder; Adams, Goudmijn, Osborn; Blackett-Taylor, Yates, Salvesen.

arts.ttl: Cardiff City v Derby County Live: Kick-off time, team news and score updates
arts.sum: Follow all the action from Cardiff City Stadium as the Bluebirds take on Derby County

arts.ttl: The New Saints Women vs. Cardiff City Women
arts.sum: Ahead of the clash, head coach Iain Darbyshire said: "Part of the reason we've been so successful in the past few years is that we’ve had competition in every single position and the players don't get complacent. I think that's our challenge, credit to them and what they've done this year and they'll be coming into the game full of confidence, but for us, it's about doing the right thing in the right way, ensuring that everyone contributes through the game and executes the game plan and if we do that, we’ll have a good chance of coming away with a positive result.

New signing Yousef Salech made himself an instant hero on Tuesday night as his 96th-minute goal rescued a point for Cardiff against a struggling Millwall side. The Bluebirds are now unbeaten in their ...
